Add No Follow Links to App Themes Vantage

Nov 21, 2013
1 minute read

AppThemesâ€™ Vantage does not have nofollow on the directory links nor the social icons. Replace this on single-listing.php to add no follow links (otherwise you will be following all the links off your page)
